backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining vocabulary data structures (VocabularyWord, Question, UserStats) and a hardcoded list of 15+ GRE vocabulary words with definitions, parts of speech, example sentences, difficulty levels, and categories.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React components, pages, hooks, and configuration files describing routing, UI components, state management, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, defining background, foreground, card, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, border, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the GRE Vocabulary Builder application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, flashcards, practice test, progress, and settings pages, wrapped in ThemeProvider and Layout with Toaster and notification hook.
Interactive flashcard component with 3D flip animation showing vocabulary word on front and definition on back, with navigation controls and loading states using useGetPracticeQuestion hook.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper providing sticky header with logo and navigation (desktop/mobile menu), main content area, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/NotificationSett: Settings component managing browser notification permissions, daily reminder toggle, time picker for notification scheduling, and test notification button with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/components/PracticeTest.tsx: React component that renders an interactive practice test with multiple-choice questions, tracks score and progress, shows feedback for correct/incorrect answers, and calls onComplete when the test finishes.
frontend/src/components/ProgressDashboar: Dashboard component displaying user statistics including words learned, accuracy rate, total attempts, and correct answers with progress bars and stat cards using data from useUserProgress hook.
frontend/src/components/TestResults.tsx: Results screen component that displays test score, percentage, performance message, and action buttons to retake the test or return home.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor with Internet Identity authentication, automatically invalidating and refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Hook that schedules daily browser notifications at a user-configured time to remind them to study, with click navigation to flashcards page.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching practice questions, submitting answers, and retrieving user statistics from the backend actor with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProgress.ts: Simple hook that combines useInternetIdentity and useGetUserStats to fetch the current authenticated user's progress statistics.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm academic color palette (burgundy, cream, forest green) for both light and dark modes, plus utility classes for 3D card transformations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/FlashcardsPage.tsx: Page component that displays the FlashcardViewer component with a header card explaining the flashcard study session.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature cards (Flashcards, Practice Tests, Progress), and statistics section showcasing the app's value proposition.
frontend/src/pages/PracticeTestPage.tsx: Page managing practice test flow with test configuration (number of questions), test execution via PracticeTest component, and results display via TestResults component.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Page displaying the ProgressDashboard component with a header card for tracking user learning statistics.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page containing the NotificationSettings component for customizing user preferences.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom colors (burgundy, forest green, cream), typography, border radius, shadows, and animations for the academic-themed UI.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking implemented features (flashcards, practice tests, progress tracking, notifications, UI design), known issues (empty words list), and pending feature requests including populating 3000 GRE words.
